mapper.select: SELECT merc_name, entity_inner_code FROM m_merchant_entity WHERE entity_inner_code IN ( SELECT entity_inner_code FROM m_merchant_core_entity_ref WHERE inner_code IN ( SELECT inner_code FROM m_merchant_user_rel WHERE app_user_id = #{userId} ) )
